attributes.action: Abolish the idea of the 50p Broadband tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as you are all proberly aware by now the government is trying to introduce a 50p broadband tax to everyone that obviously has a fixed connection. well this is appaling the likes of virgin, bt have the money to upgrade and either install new/existing cables. with the currant econimic climate who is to say that this is goin to go towards improving the broadband services just like the speed cameras, they dont go towards the roads again.anyway lets put a stop to this madness i am no sick of what the government is doing to us all. if your not happy about this tax sign the petition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
